summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1428, for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East Forty-fifth Street to Pacific Place, by constructing a sewer therein, together with all wyes, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15524 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
